I just received the book in the mail.  I guess it did get printed after all.
Very nice book at a great price.

 

Jim

*	I just received this note from Amazon.  Can anyone confirm that this
book is
not being reprinted?



Thanks,

Jim





Greetings from Amazon.com.



We are sorry to report that the release of the following

item has been cancelled:



  Albert J. Koop, Hogitaro Inada "Japanese Names and How to Read 

            Them: A Manual for Art Collectors and Students"



Though we had expected to be able to send this item to you, we've

since found that it will not be released after all.  Please accept

our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience we have caused you.

    

We have cancelled this item from your order.
